name: TPD Group
description: we deal into Turnkey EPC Projects
overview:
Established in the year 2006, we, “TPD Group of Companies & Firms”, are an eminent organization engrossed in Turnkey EPC Projects Execution (Civil, Mechanical & Metal Fabrication), Fuel (Conversion, Storage and Supplies), Coal (Import and Export), a comprehensive resource for Cryogenics (Gases, Tanks, Industrial Bottling Stations), manufacturing and supplying a remarkable range of Piping Projects and Industrial Piping Services.

Our Team: Technicians Skilled workers Sales and marketing executives Quality controllers Designers

Our Infrastructure: We have established a sprawling and sophisticated infrastructure facility, spread across an extensive area of land. This infrastructure is installed with highly advanced machines and latest technology that are essential in the production process.

Our Quality Assurance: Being a client-centric organization, we are highly focused towards the quality of our offerings - Products, Projects and Services. Our products are manufactured and designed using the high quality raw material and advanced technology for the better development of our products.

Client Satisfaction: We are a client-based organization, engaged in providing a qualitative products and services to our clients. Our organization is focused towards the satisfaction of our clients respecting their feedback. We are completely engaged in incorporating their valuable suggestions in all the business operations and executions.

Corporate Responsibility: TPD is strongly committed to conducting its business activities in accordance with high ethical standards that are derived from such fundamental values as honesty, integrity, reliability, fairness, mutual respect and trust. We believe this is the right way to operate our businesses.
